text: Takaw olap abe kɨlop agñɨbɨm agak. Anɨb apɨm, Bɨ olap ñɨn dad aplanɨl God nop sɨbogep abañ adek ak yomɨl agɨnɨgab, Yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨnɨgab ak, takaw anɨb ak takaw yokɨp, kɨdek agup tek ma gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup apɨm agak. Pen bɨ olap ñɨn dad aplanɨl, tap God nop dagɨlep ak yomɨl agɨnɨgab, Yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨnɨgab, kɨdek agup tek nep gɨnɨmuŋ apɨm agak.
